name: VainPlanet
description:
VainPlanet is a VR shooting game aiming for high score by attacking enemies while avoiding or preventing attacks from drones.

You can advance the wave by shooting down the drones that appear one after another and preventing attacks.
You can use a shotgun to kick and disperse them, or you can kill them one by one.
Let's advance the wave and aim for the first place in the world ranking!

We will also add the ability to read VRM files and use avatars!
